page.title: 07ALLANBANK CARAVAN PARK
page.content: The caravan park is situated behind the Allanbank Hotel beside the River Allan. It is a Caravan Club site and only members of the Club may put their caravans on the site. Caravanners normally stay for 1 or 2 days or for a weekend, but some stay for 1 or 2 weeks. Keen fishermen stay longer as there is good fishing on the river. Lovely rainbow trout can be fished there if you have a permit. The site opens in time for the Easter weekend and closes at the end of September.It is looked after by a warden during the season that it is occupied.It is a lovely flat site and ideally situated for people who wish to tour the beautiful countryside in and around Perthshire.
